ReturnPolicy.Description:
DOMESTIC RETURNS
Ebay only gives a choice of a 14 day period to contact for returns yet my shop policy is a 7 day period to contact for a return.

INTERNATIONAL RETURNS
All international sales are final.  No returns.

Title: Gold Tone Long Back Dangle Hijab / Hair Head Chain, Wedding Engagement Eid Party
Description: 💗This is a beautiful handmade gold tone metal hijab chain with a subtle thick front gold chain and a beautiful design in the back. Has multi strands of chains that almost look like long gold hair. Well made. Sways nicely with your hair. NON Adjustable & ONE SIZE Fits most. Great for that special event. Photos show no justice to this piece. Just stunning! Fabulous shine! 👉GET A FREE GIFT WITH EVERY ORDER!!! 👉LETS CHAT :) Please do feel free to contact me for any reason. If you have a special request, need more quanty or want something custom made, be sure to let me know. I would be glad to hear from you! 👉MOST IMPORTANTLY Thank you for stopping by and God bless you! :)))💗 👉👉👉SAVINGS & POLICIES👈👈👈 -----------ONLY ON HIJAB JEWELRY----------- 👉FREE DOMESTIC SHIPPING DISCOUNT Want to save on more? Be sure to check out my other items and get a combined shipping per order! Pay only $3 shipping for the first item and all additional items ship for FREE! 👉DOMESTIC RETURNS There is a limit of 7 days to contact me if you are not satisfied. Item must be in good condition as sent. Buyer must pay return shipping fees. When I receive the package, I will then reimburse the cost of the item alone. -OR- If the buyer wants to purchase other items totaling $15 or more, I will credit the cost of the item returned, plus buyer paid return shipping fees (up to $3) and I will pay the shipping fees on the new order. I will try my best to make you happy. So please do contact me before feedback or a star rating. Thank you. 👉FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING DISCOUNT Want to save on more?
